overview:
Charles Gourlaouen is currently Chief Technology Officer at www.tvtrip.com.

Ex project director at Brandalley.com, where he was in charge of the internet website for the French market.

Charles brings a unique expertise in ebusiness and online travel, with a technical and management background (Telecom Paris engineering & ESSEC Information System Management) he started his career at Computer Associates (1997), where he gained significant experience in technology, then headed accorhotels.com as Web & Wireless Project Manager (1999).

Then, coordinated development at voyages-sncf.com (2000), integrated Accor and Expedia within the voyages-sncf.com portal. He also designed the first train epackage webservices (including flight/train, hotel and car reservation) used by Expedia, Lastminute and Eurostarâ€¦

His initial involvement began in the hospitality side of the business.

At age 21, he conducted the implementation study of Sofitel Royal Angkor in Cambodia.

Charles is 34 years old. His blog: www.gourlaouen.com
